Please try to restart your device and then download the update again. %1$d MB CLOSE RETRY Your update will be downloaded in the background… Cyanogen OS Update Cyanogen OS Version: %1$s Cyanogen OS Version Download complete Download failed Settings Choose your device and update method: Device Update method Your settings are automatically saved. Explanation of update methods] An incremental update can only be installed if you were running the latest version before this update was released.\n\nA full update can be always be installed - regardless of your current software version running on your device. Please wait while your settings are being saved. Show these messages in the app: News and warnings App update is available Send me these push notification: Important warnings System update is available New device is supported Hide update information when: My system is up to date Retry Server maintenance Please wait while the server undergoes maintenance. The server will be back online very soon. Invalid app version This app can no longer be used. Try updating it from Google Play by clicking on Google Play below and then on Update. If this error persists, uninstall the app and reinstall it again. This app requires an active Internet connection Failed to fetch update information from the server. Please make sure you have an active Internet connection. The application will now close. Exit Google Play Unable to connect to the app server. In order to receive notifications about new updates, please try launching the app again. No internet connection. Welcome Welcome to Cyanogen update tracker! This app will allow you to stay informed about the latest Android™ updates for your Cyanogen® OS powered device. \n\nSwipe to the left to continue. Choose your device: In order to stay up-to-date, you will need to choose a device from the list shown above.\n\nWhen more devices running Cyanogen OS are released, they\'ll automatically be added and you will be notified!\n\nSwipe to the left to continue. Choose your update method: For most of the devices, there are two update methods shown in the list above. These are the full and the incremental update.\n\nAn incremental update can only be installed if you had the latest version before the new update was released. This is the kind of update your phone normally downloads via the Settings app. (recommended)\n\nA full update contains everything and can always be installed on your device, but is bigger to download and takes longer to install. Use this to skip versions (like updating from 4.4.x to 5.1).\n\nSwipe to the left to continue. You are ready to go! Enjoy using this app!\n\nYou can always change your settings by clicking the three dots in the top right corner (or press your Menu button) following a tap on \'change device and update method\'. start app Install guide Tutorial image. Download the update. Press the Download button to start the download process. The download will appear in your notifications screen. When it\'s done, you\'ll see a notification like this: Enter Recovery Mode. - Turn off your device first. - Press both the power and the volume down button at the same time. - Wait until you see the recovery menu on your screen. Apply the downloaded update. - Within the recovery menu, choose Apply Update. - Select Choose from Internal Storage. - Go to 0, Download, and select the zip file matching the tile shown within the app. Restart your device. - Within the recovery menu, choose Reboot System Now. - Your device will show the Cyanogen logo for a long time while it is updating. - After this step, you\'ll see \'Android is upgrading\' while your apps are being optimized. Done. Enjoy your new Cyanogen OS! - After your device has finished the update process, you can check the version of your system: - Go to Settings, About Phone, and check the Cyanogen OS Version. - If you like this app, give it 5 stars at Google Play! Close Installation Guide Device information Device info Device image Your device: System on a Chip: Processor Frequency: Amount of memory: Android version: Security patch date: Cyanogen OS version: Serial number: %1$s GHz Unknown %1$s %2$s About this app Version: %1$s Rate on Google Play An app to track Cyanogen OS updates. This app is written by Arjan Vlek, an IT-interested guy living in Zoetermeer, The Netherlands.\n\nThis app is inspired by a website (click), which provides similar functionality. This app aims to be more user-friendly and to offer more features.\n\nIf you like my app, please rate it on Google play now: ** Add your AdMob ad block ID here ** ** Add your AdMob ad block ID here ** Version is now available for the Open the app to download the update. New device released! Updates for the can now be tracked! Open the app to choose this device. A new version is available for your Help Overview of this app: If a new update is available, its version is displayed in the top. In the middle are the English description, the download button and a button for the installation guide.\n\nBelow these, the download size is shown. At the top right you can find the menu. It contains the settings and a help button, which allows you to view this page again. Used symbols: Shows you the download size of this update. Update voor %1$s
